LanguageData.JRWPlatyhystrixReconstruct.label: Platyhystrix
LanguageData.JRWPlatyhystrixReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #06281-1910 [PLATYHYSTRIX RUGOSUS] CODENAME: COOKIE >982
A temnospondyl amphibian with a distinctive sail along its back, similar to synapsids such as Dimetrodon and Edaphosaurus. It is theorized that the large, lumpy sail was used to thermoregulate. The short, stocky build indicates a largly terrestial lifestyle, living in the swampy, sandy biomes of the early carboniferous to the late permian.
